profile:
Vancouver is our home, and as a family owned and operated business, we strive every day to provide the best possible services for our friends and neighbors. Weâ€™re a community-based business, which is why we offer the lowest prices guaranteed, senior discounts, and fast and reliable services.
 
With more than 30 years of combined experience in the industry, Speedy Plumbing is a name you can trust for all of your plumbing, drainage, and heating services. We help with trenchless waterlines, waterline replacement, plumbing, drainage, perimeter drain services, water line repair, hot water tanks, and strata and property managers. 
 
If you find yourself in need of plumbing services, give us a call at one of our many Vancouver area offices and discover what it means to receive the best possible plumbing services from a business that views you as a friend.
 
Speedy Plumbing and Rooter offers the following benefits to all customers:
 
Prompt, 60-minute service
Guaranteed lowest prices
Free estimates
Price beat guarantee
24/7 service and repairs
Senior discounts offered
Specials and promotions

Your personal HVAC technicians in the Lower Mainland and Fraser Valley. We're fully licensed Red Seal certified journeyman technicians with 18+years experience in Vancouver. Open to 24/hr emergency service calls! We'll take care of all your heating and cooling service issues, whether it's heat pumps, hot water tanks, or furnaces. Old renovations or new construction, residential or commercial, we're your one stop shop.

We're social here:

We have over 20 years of combined experience in plumbing and draining and believe in providing honest and dependable service â€“ no matter what! For this reason, we employ only certified and licensed plumbing technicians. By immediately responding to all calls, we ensure that our staff of qualified plumbers provides long-term satisfaction.
